install.name: System - Google Ajax library
install.author: JoeGuo
install.description: Host your javascript lib on Google server, includes mootools, prototye,JQuery etc.

param.name: MootoolsName
param.label: Mootools File Name
param.description: Default is mootools.js, your site may have a name of mootools.pack.js etc, please verify.

param.name: MootoolsVersion
param.label: Mootools Version
param.description: Which Mootools version to load from Google? Default is 1.11.

param.name: JQueryVersion
param.label: JQuery Version
param.description: Which JQuery version to load from Google? Default is 1.2.6

param.name: JQueryName
param.label: JQuery File Name
param.description: Default is jquery.js, your site may have a name of jquery.1.2.6.js or jquery.min.js etc, please verify.

param.name: PrototypeVersion
param.label: Prototype Version
param.description: Which Prototype version to load from Google? Default is 1.6.0.3

param.name: PrototypeName
param.label: Prototype File Name
param.description: Default is prototype.js, your site's prototye may have different name, please verify.

param.name: ReplaceYUI
param.label: Replace YUI
param.description: Use Yahoo! User Interface Library (YUI) from Google.

param.name: YUIVersion
param.label: YUI Version
param.description: Which YUI version to load from Google? Default is 2.7.0

param.name: YUIName
param.label: YUI File Name
param.description: Default is yuiloader.js, your site's YUI may have different name, please verify.

param.name: SWFObjectVersion
param.label: SWFObject Version
param.description: Which SWFObject version to load from Google? Default is 2.2

param.name: SWFObjectName
param.label: SWFObject File Name
param.description: Default is swfobject.js, your site's SWFObject may have different name, please verify.
